title: Shopping Bag, 1979
medium: Offset lithograph on white paper;two black plastic handles
inscribed: Printed on bottom: Packaging by design (TM) / Modern Arts / Made in U.S.A. A Lindsay Company / New York/Toronto (212) 221-6300.
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: Alternating black and orange diagonal stripes over all. In center of recto and verso: a diamond shaped lozenge resembling a street sign is shown with the words STREET SHOES, and a black arrow below pointing up.
